Package net.consensys.cava.ssz

Simple Serialize (SSZ) encoding and decoding.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SSZReader
    A reader for consuming values from an SSZ encoded source.
    SSZWriter
    A writer for encoding values to SSZ.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SSZ
    Simple Serialize (SSZ) encoding and decoding.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    EndOfSSZException
    Indicates the end of the SSZ source has been reached unexpectedly.
    InvalidSSZTypeException
    Indicates that an unexpected type was encountered when decoding SSZ.
    SSZException
    Base type for all SSZ encoding and decoding exceptions.

Package net.consensys.cava.ssz Description

Simple Serialize (SSZ) encoding and decoding.

An implementation of the Ethereum Simple Serialize (SSZ) algorithm, as described at https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/blob/master/specs/simple-serialize.md.

These classes are included in the standard Cava distribution, or separately when using the gradle dependency 'net.consensys.cava:cava-ssz' (cava-ssz.jar).
